留言內容: So many tops run small from many of the sellers on Amazon. This tee runs true to size. I ordered a size larger than I normally wear because I wanted this to be oversized and loose and it fits exactly as I wanted.  So order your regular size and it should fit as expected.This tee is super soft and comfortable.The pattern is colorful and pretty.It looks just like advertised.I washed and dried it on low with no problems.It's a great quality for the cost.
